A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Like the Episode VII\, this is another \"remake\" of The Return of The Jedi mixed with some of The Empire Strikes Back. This movie is bad\, slow\, with characters that are totally unnecessary for the movie\, nonsense scenes\, absurd dialogues\, and a long list of nonsense things that have ruined this legendary saga even more than with Episode VII. Congratulations Disney\, you bunch of incompetents.
